text: Nigel John Spearing (8 October 1930 - 8 January 2017) was a British politician. He was a member of the Labour Party. He served as a Member of Parliament for South Newham from 1974 to 1997. Before this, he served as a Member of Parliament for Acton from 1970 to 1974. He was born in Hammersmith, London. Spearing died from Alzheimer's disease on 8 January 2017. He was 86. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Members of the British House of Commons for English constituencies Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs Category:People from Hammersmith Category:Politicians from London Category:UK MPs 1970–1974 Category:UK MPs 1974 Category:UK MPs 1974–1979 Category:UK MPs 1979–1983 Category:UK MPs 1983–1987 Category:UK MPs 1987–1992 Category:UK MPs 1992–1997
title: Nigel Spearing
